About Me

Leandro Michelena is a full stack web developer. Leandro finished the UofT SCS Coding Bootcamp in July of 2022 and this website shows his portfolio of works done during the course.

Work

Trip it

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6

Build for the group project 1 of the Coding Bootcamp, Trip it is a website built to search for flights, attractions and weather information.

View Project on GitHub

Lazy Plant Caretaker

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, Bootstrap, Node

Built for the group project 2 of the Coding Bootcamp, this website is a place to discover plants and how to take the best care of them.

View Project on GitHub

Eye Spy

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, Bootstrap, Node

Built for the group project 3 of the Coding Bootcamp, this website features places recommended by the userbase for hiking and outdoor activities.

View Project on GitHub

Code Quiz

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS

Created as a learning exercise for JavaScript and logic, this website presents the user with a series of questions with a running timer. By the end of the quiz, the remaing time becomes the user score and a local leaderboard is displayed.

View Project on GitHub
